title: The Secret Witch
description:
All magic has a price…But what it cost me can never be given back.So I'll have to settle for vengeance.
Don’t miss the epic finale for The Coven: Academy Magic in The Secret Witch. The problems for this sharp-witted heroine and swoon-worthy hero are only getting crazier. Fans of The Mortal Instruments, Twilight, or Harry Potter will love Chandelle LaVaun’s brand new urban fantasy series!
author: Chandelle LaVaun
